Room.Name: Kafkan Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking on Kafkan Way, north of the South Oceancrest Post Office.
Room.LongDescription: A small postal facility lies on the south side of the road. Being that communications are the most important thing in a good society, the mail system tends to be very accurate and prompt. On the north side of the road is a small fountain. The fountain seems to be sitting in the middle of the large park on the Iilandi Campus.
